channel.title: Profit-losses on WETHOD / Learning Center
channel.description: Recent content in Profit-losses on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Profit & Loss
item.description: Overview This section shows you the Revenues that your company have minus all the costs distributed per mont. The result is the Profit & Loss that helps you understanding how much you effectively earned and how your business is going on. On the middle you have: Gross Margin (Revenues - External Costs) and also the Total Gross Margin per year. Net Margin (Gross Margin - Payroll) and also the Total Net Margin per year.
